General.Name: Parity Group
General.Description: Parity Group plc, together with its subsidiaries, provides a recruitment, and data and technology solutions in the United Kingdom, European Union, and internationally. It offers data services, such as data science, data assessment, data strategy, and data driven efficiencies. The company also provides people solutions, such as permanent and contract recruitment in the fields of IT and business change, digital transformation, data and analytics, and infrastructure and software engineering. It serves government, defense, health, education, ICT, utility, retail and FMCG, financial, and professional and business industries, as well as not for profit organizations. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 82 St. John Street, London, United Kingdom, EC1M 4JN
